name: Rex, Gale Fur Hire
text: You can reveal this card in your hand; Special Summon 1 monster "Fur Hire", then Special Summon this card. You can only use this effect of "Rex Gale Fur Hire" once per turn. If a card is added from the Deck to the opponent's hand by a non-"Fur Hire" card's effect and you control another monster "Fur Hire": You can draw 1 card.
